string-array.name: ThemeChangelog
string-array.item:
v3.5 - Sat, 06-01-2018
- Themed missing powermenu icons.
- Dialer custom icons.
- Fully themed dialer subsettings.
- Inverted settings theme.
- Fixed sim color picker dialog texts.

v3.4 - Wed, 03-01-2018
- Themed AOSP Keyboard.
- Themed AOSP Dialer and Contacts.
- Added Blueberry accent.
- Fixed navbar visibility.
- Merged upstream template changes.

v3.3 - Mon, 25-12-2017
- Hotfix update.
- Fixed substratum new ui theming.

v3.2 - Mon, 25-12-2017
- Added option to enable/disable rounded corners.
- Extended Translucent option to Qs, Notifications and PowerMenu.
- Fully themed Settings suggestions/conditions.
- Removed Bold text from toast.
- Updated dark navbar color.
- Dropped 8.0 support.
v3.1 - Thu, 14-12-2017\n- Added back support for 8.0.\n

v3.0 - Wed, 13-12-2017
- Added support for 8.1.
- Merged upstream template changes.
- Themed navbar ripple colors.
- Themed physical keyboard shortcuts BG.
- Themed qs expand/collapse icons.
- Themed Lockscreen shortcuts circle BG.
- Themed notification app icon/name color.
- Added Shutdown animation and fonts (Requires ROM with SubstratumService).
- Added Dashboard.
- Fully themed Launcher3.
- Fully themed MusicFX.
- Center/left clock options.
- Themed notification volume panel icon.
